short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a date filter to Github issues and PRs pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Add the power of Github advanced search to UI filters!

Github currently provides the following filters for issues and PRs:
- author
- label
- projects
- milestones
- assignees
- sort

Using the advanced search keywords, you can filter more thoroughly your issues at the expense of manually typing the keywords.

With Github Dates Filter, add a dates filter to your Github interface and say good bye to manually entering dates in the search!
